name: Fort Greene Bar Community Fridge
description: Community fridge open to the public 24/7. Take what you need, leave what you can. Part of Denver Community Fridges.

name: Denver Dream Center Community Fridge
description: Free community fridge accessible anytime. Stocked with fresh and prepared foods. Part of Denver Community Fridges network.

name: Re:Vision Community Fridge
description: Community-maintained fridge open 24/7. Take what you need, share what you can. Part of Denver Community Fridges.

name: Seventh Circle Music Collective Fridge
description: Free community fridge accessible 24/7. Fresh and prepared foods available. Part of Denver Community Fridges.

name: Food Bank of the Rockies
description: Colorado's largest hunger-relief organization. Provides food assistance and nutrition education programs.

name: Metro Caring
description: Emergency food, clothing, and financial assistance for Denver residents. No appointment necessary.

name: Denver Blessing Box - City Park
description: Community blessing box with non-perishable food items. Take what you need, give what you can.

name: Father Woody's Haven of Hope
description: Serves meals and provides groceries to individuals and families experiencing homelessness or food insecurity.

name: Struggle of Love Foundation
description: Provides food, clothing, and supportive services to neighbors in need. Walk-ins welcome.

name: Community Blessing Box - Sloan's Lake
description: Free community food box with non-perishable items. Always open, no questions asked.
